Title: Cop-Con
Writer: Daniel J. Goor (created by), Michael Schur (created by), Andy Gosche, David Phillips (executive story editor), Justin Noble (executive story editor), Carly Hallam (story editor), Alexis Wilkinson (story editor)

Plot: Holt tells the squad to be on their best behavior at Cop-Con.
